Desc.eng: Oh my! You look like something that the cat dragged in.
Private Antonov reporting, sir! Returning from the sewers, sir! I have grave news, sir!
Let the man talk. What did you see down there?
About two dozen soldier-machines are testing their strange machines in the tunnels. I couldn’t face them on my own. Sir.
Good work! I’ll look into this.
I don’t have time for this. Just tell Count Vlados what happened.
Wait, are we using military ranks now? Can I get one too?
